body:
> When the stateful is False, is there other possible way to set initial hidden state???

You can use `reset_states([state1, state2, ...])` to set states *by value* (e.g. by specifying numpy arrays). To specify *symbolic* states, use the `initial_state` argument when calling the layer instance on new inputs.
